text:
ACT SAT Prep How to determine the the missing length of a word problem

[imath] i [/imath]\n(1) Jimmy's school is 1.2 miles from his house\non the same street. If he walks down the\nstreet directly from the house to his school he passes candy store and a grocery store. The candy store 0.35 miles from the school\n(1) and the grocery store 0.67 miles from the candy store. How many miles is it from the grocery store to Jimmy's house?
